title: Apple News targets Bay Area residents with its first local daily newsletter
content:
Apple on Tuesday announced the launch of its first local daily newsletter on Apple News targeting the Bay Area. Readers will find top stories from multiple segments as well as different local publications directly in the News app.

more…

The post Apple News targets Bay Area residents with its first local daily newsletter appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: The Bay Area newsletter on Apple News will feature stories about sports, politics, dining, and more from different local publications.
